fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core

Class ParserFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core.ParserFactory

  • public abstract class ParserFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for ParserFactory that handle creation and access of Parser as Singleton
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Pierre Criulanscy

    • Method Detail

      • getParser

        public abstract <P extends Parser<T>,T extends ResourceRepresentation<?>> P getParser(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Method to retrieve Parser. Parser should be store in mParserMap in order to store parser as singleton : 

        if(mParserMap.containsKey(clazz))
        return (P) mParserMap.get(clazz);

mParserMap.put(clazz, //your specific parser here);
return (P) mParserMap.get(clazz);

        Parameters:
        clazz - The ResourceRepresentation class
        Returns:
        Instance of Parser
